name: Space Scums 1
description:
Space Scums 1: The Rescuing of Prince Custard is an illustrated text adventure in which you, Lizard Captain Barry Bostic embarks on an intergalactic odyssey across space to save King Flea's precious son. Visit planets such as Keeto, Anthanel, and Oo, searching for the famed monarch, every clue leading you closer to Prince Custard. The highest score you can get is 100, so start hunting!

Play: https://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/vyrt6h9s9ec_aceknqkdhw/space-scums
